shorty.translation[0].definitions[0].def: used as an insulting name for someone who is not very tall
shorty.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a woman – used especially by people who play or listen to hip-hop music
shorty.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a baby – used especially by people who play or listen to hip-hop music
shorty.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: Shawna says she’s gonna be having my shorty.
